TopicTitle: Switching to my station destroys Kerbin

Articles.Content:
Would anyone help me repair my game.. Here's what happens after I switch to my station:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Edited February 14, 2015 by Enceos

I've seen this once or twice before, but I'm not very sure on a fix...I'm sorry, I saw this and was trying to get my own system to do the same, but this has happened only once in an earlier version of KSP.
I seem to be getting this more frequently than crashes. Can anyone help me?

I seem to be getting this more frequently than crashes. Can anyone help me?

The last I saw of this was before I put ActiveTextureManagement into my build (modlist was just big enough to cause this and not big enough to directly crash the game)

since you already have atm, which compression set are you using (normal, or aggressive)?
